org.openscience.cdk.smsd.helper

Class BondEnergy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.smsd.helper.BondEnergy

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.smsd.helper.BondEnergyTest")
public class BondEnergy
extends Object
    Helper class defining the energy for a bond type. The bond type is defined as to element symbols and a bond order.
    Author:
    Syed Asad Rahman
    Belongs to CDK module:
    smsd
    Source code:
    HEAD
